mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM `class_info` WHERE 1 = 1 AND `status` = 1 AND `create_id` = #{userId}

select a.*,b.`NAME` teacherName from `class_info` a left join member b on a.create_id = b.user_id where 1 = 1 AND a.`status` = 1 AND a.`create_id` = #{userId}
limit ${startIndex}, ${pageSize}
select count(1) from `class_info`a join class_student_mapping b on a.rec_id =b.class_id and b.student_id =#{userId} where 1 = 1 AND a.`status` = 1

select a.*,c.`NAME` teacherName from `class_info` a join class_student_mapping b on a.rec_id =b.class_id and b.student_id =#{userId} left join member c on a.create_id = c.user_id where 1 = 1 AND a.`status` = 1
limit ${startIndex}, ${pageSize}
select a.* , b.`NAME` teacherName from `class_info` a left join member b on a.create_id = b.user_id where `class_code` = #{classCode}
